customer_name: East Coast Exotic Animal Rescue Inc
site_name: East Coast Exotic Animal Rescue Inc

citations.narrative:
The enclosure housing two emus has a large gap in the chain link fencing material. The gap is approximately 8 inches by
10 inches in size and has two areas where the wire has broken resulting in sharp points in the enclosure.
Enclosures with sharp points and gaps can allow for entrapment or injury of the animals.
The facility must repair or replace the fencing material in the emu enclosure to protect the animals from sharp points and
gaps which could injure the birds.
Correct by: 02/26/2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.153(a)(1)(i) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
The enclosure housing two emus has a large gap in the chain link fencing material. The gap is approximately 8 inches by 
10 inches in size and has two areas where the wire has broken resulting in sharp points in the enclosure. 
Enclosures with sharp points and gaps can allow for entrapment or injury of the animals.  
The facility must repair or replace the fencing material in the emu enclosure to protect the animals from sharp points and 
gaps which could injure the birds.  
Correct by: 02/26/2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
